initialInvestment.label: How much do you want to invest now?
initialInvestment.help: The input must be between £500 and £100,000

timeHorizon.label: How long do you want to invest for?
timeHorizon.help: The number of years to invest, must be between 5 and 75

monthlyContribution.label: How much would you like to invest each month? (optional)
monthlyContribution.help: The input must be between £250 and £100,000

start.content: We'll gather some essential facts about you that will help us provide advice that fits your financial situation.

income.label: What is your monthly income (after tax)?
income.helpAbove: Include income from salary, pensions, investments, rental properties and any other sources.

outgoings.label: How much is your fixed monthly expenditure?
outgoings.helpAbove: Enter a realistic estimate of your costs that you have to spend, such as household costs, clothing, personal debt payments and childcare.

assets.label: What is the value of your liquid assets (money and investments)?
assets.helpAbove: Do not include the value of property, pensions or other assets that are not liquid.

emergencyFunds.header: If you needed money in the case of an emergency, would you have access to enough without having to take it from this investment?

options.1: Yes, I have personal savings that I can use for emergencies
options.2: Yes, I have other assured means of accessing money such as a spouse, friends, relatives or excess disposable income sufficient to meet my needs
options.3: Maybe. I might take cash from this investment but would consider other sources first
options.4: No, I have no other alternative, I would most certainly need to access this investment

start.content: This set of questions are based on behavioural and cognitive theory to understand the risk you are willing and able to take.
Define your goal so that you have something to aim for and you can monitor progress of your investments in a meaningful way.

age.label: How old are you?
age.helpAbove: We’ll use this to check that the length of time you want to invest for is realistic. Note that if you are over 80 we don't currently have a suitable investment recommendation for you.
